00019 #ifndef _DEMOD_MSK_HPP_cm130214_
00020 #define _DEMOD_MSK_HPP_cm130214_
00021 
00022 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00024 
00025 #include "filter/iir.hpp"
00026 #include "filter/pll.hpp"
00027 #include "filter/goertzel.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace demod {  
00030   class msk : public boost::noncopyable {
00031   public:
00032     typedef boost::shared_ptr<msk> sptr;
00033         
00034     typedef filter::loop_filter_2nd<double> loop_filter;
00035     typedef filter::integrator_modulo<double> integrator;
00036     typedef filter::pll<double, loop_filter, integrator> pll_type;
00037     typedef pll_type::complex_type complex_type;
00038 
00039     typedef goertzel<complex_type>  goertzel_type;
00040 
00041     static sptr make(double fs_Hz,      // sampling frequency
00042                      double fc_Hz,      // center frequency
00043                      double fm_Hz,      // frequency of modulation \equiv baud/2
00044                      double dwl_Hz,     // bandwidth of PLL
00045                      double period_Sec, // Goertzel filter time period
00046                      double xi = 1./sqrt(2)) {
00047       return sptr(new msk(fs_Hz, fc_Hz, fm_Hz, dwl_Hz, period_Sec, xi));
00048     }
00049 
00050     void update_ppb(double ppb, double fc, double fm) {
00051       pll_plus_.update_ppb(ppb,  2*fc+fm);
00052       pll_minus_.update_ppb(ppb, 2*fc-fm);
00053     }
00054 
00055     void reset() {
00056       pll_plus_.reset();
00057       pll_minus_.reset();
00058       sumE_  = sumO_  = 0.;
00059       signE_ = signO_ = 0;
00060       bitE_  = bitO_  = false;
00061     }
00062 
00063     bool   phase_available() const { return sample_counter_ == 0; }
00064     double period_sec()      const { return period_/fs_Hz_; }
00065     double delta_phase_rad() const { return delta_phase_; }
00066 
00067     bool   bit_available() const   { return bit_availableE_ | bit_availableO_; }
00068     bool   current_bit()  const    { return current_bit_; }
00069 
00070     const goertzel_type& gf_plus()   const { return gf_plus_;   }
00071     const goertzel_type& gf_center() const { return gf_center_; }
00072     const goertzel_type& gf_minus()  const { return gf_minus_;  }
00073 
00074     const pll_type& pll_plus()  const { return pll_plus_;  }
00075     const pll_type& pll_minus() const { return pll_minus_; }
00076 
00077     void process(complex_type s) {
00078       if (sample_counter_ == 0) {
00079         gf_plus_.reset();
00080         gf_center_.reset();
00081         gf_minus_.reset();
00082       }
00083       const complex_type s2(std::pow(s, 2));
00084       gf_plus_.update(s2);
00085       gf_center_.update(s2);
00086       gf_minus_.update(s2);
00087       pll_plus_.process(s2);
00088       pll_minus_.process(s2);
00089       
00090       // bit stream
00091       //  (1) 4*carrier phase
00092       const double theta0(pll_plus_.theta() + pll_minus_.theta());
00093       //  (2) demodulated signal
00094       const complex_type x(s * exp(-complex_type(0, 0.25*theta0)));
00095       //  (3a)
00096       const double ct(cos(0.25*(pll_plus_.theta() - pll_minus_.theta()))); // baud/4
00097       const int    sign_ct(ct > 0 ? 1 : -1);
00098       const double xE(x.real() * ct);
00099       signE_ = (signE_ == 0) ? sign_ct : signE_; // init
00100       if (signE_ == sign_ct) { // no change in sign
00101         sumE_ += xE;
00102         bit_availableE_ = false;
00103       } else {
00104         // std::cout << "_E " << sumE_ << std::endl;
00105         bitE_  = (sumE_ > 0.);
00106         sumEold_ = sumE_;
00107         sumE_  = 0.;
00108         signE_ = sign_ct;
00109         current_bit_   = bitE_ ^ bitO_;
00110         bit_availableE_ = true;
00111         // std::cout << "_x " << sumEold_ << " " << sumOold_ << std::endl;
00112       }
00113       //  (3b)
00114       const double st(sin(0.25*(pll_plus_.theta() - pll_minus_.theta()))); // baud/4
00115       const int    sign_st(st > 0 ? 1 : -1);      
00116       const double xO(x.imag() * st);
00117       signO_ = (signO_ == 0) ? sign_st : signO_; // init
00118       if (signO_ == sign_st) { // no change in sign
00119         sumO_ += xO;
00120         bit_availableO_ = false;
00121       } else {
00122         // std::cout << "_O " << sumO_ << std::endl;
00123         bitO_  = (sumO_ > 0.);
00124         sumOold_ = sumO_;
00125         sumO_  = 0.;
00126         signO_ = sign_st;
00127         current_bit_   = bitE_ ^ bitO_;
00128         bit_availableO_ = true;
00129         // std::cout << "_x " << sumEold_ << " " << sumOold_ << std::endl;
00130       }
00131       //  (4)
00132       ++sample_counter_;
00133       if (sample_counter_ == period_) {
00134         sample_counter_= 0;
00135         const double carrier_phase(.25*(pll_plus().theta() + pll_minus().theta()));
00136         delta_phase_ = carrier_phase-last_phase_;
00137         while (delta_phase_ >   M_PI) delta_phase_ -= 2*M_PI;
00138         while (delta_phase_ <= -M_PI) delta_phase_ += 2*M_PI;
00139         last_phase_ = carrier_phase;
00140       }
00141     }
00142   protected:
00143   private: 
00144     static pll_type make_pll(double fs_Hz,
00145                              double fc_Hz,
00146                              double dwl_Hz,
00147                              double xi) {
00148       loop_filter l(xi, dwl_Hz, fs_Hz);
00149       integrator  i(8*M_PI);
00150       return pll_type(fc_Hz, fs_Hz, dwl_Hz, l, i);
00151     }
00152 
00153     msk(double fs_Hz,
00154         double fc_Hz,
00155         double fm_Hz, // baud/2
00156         double dwl_Hz,
00157         double period_Sec,
00158         double xi)
00159       : fs_Hz_(fs_Hz)
00160       , period_(size_t(period_Sec*fs_Hz+0.5))
00161       , pll_plus_ (make_pll(fs_Hz, 2*fc_Hz+fm_Hz, dwl_Hz, xi)) //  baud/2
00162       , pll_minus_(make_pll(fs_Hz, 2*fc_Hz-fm_Hz, dwl_Hz, xi)) // -baud/2
00163       , gf_plus_  ((2*fc_Hz+fm_Hz)/fs_Hz)
00164       , gf_center_( 2*fc_Hz       /fs_Hz)
00165       , gf_minus_ ((2*fc_Hz-fm_Hz)/fs_Hz)
00166       , last_phase_(0)
00167       , delta_phase_(0)
00168       , sample_counter_(0)
00169       , sumE_(0)
00170       , sumEold_(0)
00171       , signE_(0)
00172       , bitE_(false)
00173       , bit_availableE_(false)
00174       , sumO_(0)
00175       , sumOold_(0)
00176       , signO_(0)
00177       , bitO_(false)
00178       , bit_availableO_(false)
00179       , current_bit_(false) {
00180       // std::cout << "msk: " << 2*fc_Hz+fm_Hz << " " << 2*fc_Hz << " "<< 2*fc_Hz-fm_Hz << std::endl;
00181     }
00182 
00183     const double fs_Hz_;       //
00184     const size_t period_;      //
00185 
00186     pll_type   pll_plus_;      //
00187     pll_type   pll_minus_;     //
00188 
00189     goertzel_type gf_plus_;    //
00190     goertzel_type gf_center_;  //
00191     goertzel_type gf_minus_;   //
00192 
00193     double last_phase_;        //
00194     double delta_phase_;       //
00195     size_t sample_counter_;    //
00196 
00197     double sumE_;
00198     double sumEold_;
00199     int    signE_;
00200     bool   bitE_;
00201     bool   bit_availableE_;
00202     double sumO_;
00203     double sumOold_;
00204     int    signO_;
00205     bool   bitO_;
00206     bool   bit_availableO_;
00207     bool   current_bit_;
00208   } ;
00209 
00210 } // namespace demod
00211 #endif //_DEMOD_MSK_HPP_cm130214_
